website_summaries.verdict: A sweet little playset featuring Penny guinea pig and her 2 babies in a durable and functional double stroller that easily fits your other young Critters.
pros: Stars mother and baby twin guinea pig Critters
Includes rolling double stroller with movable canopy and baby toys
cons: More accessories would have been nice

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set!!  Reduce the frustration and buy some super-glue.
customer_reviews.text: Totally charming miniatures little kids love, but a bit too miniature even for school-aged children. Unless you are buying this set to collect, there is a way for kids to have great fun with the littleness of everything and not lose most of it almost right away. With a tiny dot of super-glue, I secured the smallest items where they belonged. Now a careless brush of little fingers don't sent the pieces flying across the room where we don't find all of them until I vacuum. And dig them out of the bag. There is still lots for the baby rabbit to do. The sets are great favorites and no one but me is any the wiser about the glue.
customer_reviews.author: Alvae96Top Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: Good Wholesome Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My twin girls asked for every calico critter for christmas 😁 so of course I had to take everything out and play with it before I wrapped it to make sure all the pieces are there 😉 and this is so stinking cute! I love how innocent and cute the Calico Critters are, it's perfect if you don't want your children influenced by large busted dolls revealing clothing and makeup at an early age. I love the diversity of all the families and animals and best of all my girls love them.
customer_reviews.author: Neeners503

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and easy to broken
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter, but when I received it fell a little bit disappointed. First the package of the toy already broken, secondly the toy itself is so light and the parts are so easy to broken. Not recommended for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Calico Critters
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a Christmas gift for my niece, but some of the pieces were a lot smaller than I'd thought they'd be, so I decided to save it for her until next year. As she's not 3 yrs. old, I felt it wouldn't be safe for her. That being said, this is a really cute play set for little girls, was very well-made, cute, & would make great collector items. It came very quickly, was well packaged, & there were no problems.
customer_reviews.author: FireSpirit Designs

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cute addition to Calico Critter playtime
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her calico critters and she loves this set. She’s loves taking care of the little baby rabbit. She plays pretty rough and has broken the legs off of one of the tables. Everything else is still good.
customer_reviews.author: Magali E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, as all calico critters products. Bought it as a present for a 3 years old girl with a newborn sister, she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Cute :)
customer_reviews.text: Watch out for the VERY LITTLE pieces around a child. My daughter is 3 and loves to play with it but I wouldn’t let someone younger than that. Very tiny pieces. But just as expected !
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift!
customer_reviews.text: We got it for our kids' friend's birthday gift and she really liked it. The package wasn't too sturdy so it has a but of dent in yhdbix but the item wasn't damages. They were cute babies but I'd think price range would be $15-$18 for this product.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: So cute, my granddaughter is going to loves this in her Easter Basket. You get several cute items for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Everything that is pictured comes with the set! My child loved receiving this to add to her collection. Amazon and this seller had the best price that I could find for this item.

customer_reviews.title: Small pieces, so fun and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is such a little mommy! And she needed this cute baby set! She loves it! The quality is amazing! A lot of Calico Critters are tiny so just keep that in mind for smaller children!

customer_reviews.title: Cute and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Lots of dmdll stuff that can get lost easily. The entire Calico Critters Collection is very overpriced for the quality . But it’s trendy with little girls, so I buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Playtime favorite
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her calico critter baby set! So many great little accessories. You will have to add stickers on some things so just beware that you’ll have to help a little but the tedious sticker part is quickly forgotten by both parent and child due to the sheer awesomeness of it.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute

customer_reviews.title: Darling accessory set!
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving the product 5 stars, but - be warned - Amazon shipped me a product with badly damaged packaging (see photos)... This set is very cute. Some of the pieces are quite tiny. See my photos! Most of the accessories are well under an inch, with the spoon, baby powder, and shampoo bottle being just a half an inch. Please note: Mine was shipped in a bubble envelope (or maybe it was previously opened...) The packaging of the product was squished, torn, and badly damaged. The items were fine, but it would be too embarrassing to give as a gift in this condition.
customer_reviews.author: K.Belle

customer_reviews.title: I even want to play with them!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters loved these calico Critters. They are ages three, five, and seven. They all gravitated to them and sat down and played together. It was a joy to watch. I highly recommend these adorable toys.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it for her birthday

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my littlest niece and she loves it! It’s so adorable and holds up pretty well against a 4 year old.

customer_reviews.title: So sweet
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves her Critters. They are so sweet and a real enjoyable toy to have around. If I'm going to step on something a thousand times a day, this isn't such a bad thing. They are flocked and smooth which is great for my very sensory-seeking child. She loves textures and seeks out that extra stimulation. No other toy that I know of is soft like Critters. They are posable and also able to change clothes which she just loves to do. A nice, sweet toy for my little girl.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for little girl

Especially all the tiny pieces (the spoon is seriously like 1/4 in or smaller). She's a strange type of kid that loves tiny little things and organization. If your kid is one that likes to eat things or put items in their mouths, I would NOT recommend this item.

product_meta.title: Calico Critters Patty & Paden's Double Stroller
product_meta.description:
Style:Patty & Paden's Double Stroller SetIt’s a beautiful day and Penny Guinea Pig can take twins Patty and Paden out for a stroll in the park with this double stroller. These Ready to Play Sets come with everything you need for imaginative pretend play. Calico Critters is a unique and adorable range of distinctive animal characters with charming and beautifully detailed homes, furniture and accessories. They live, work and play in an idyllic and wonderful place called Calico Village. These timeless, classic toys promote wholesome family values. These life-like, award-winning miniatures also inspire imagination and creativity. These adorable toys promote healthy cognitive development through pretend play. Acting out storylines will exercise narrative and critical thinking processes, while fine motor skills and dexterity improve as little ones manipulate the fun environments, critters and accessories.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Penny can take her twins out for a stroll in the park with this double stroller. Includes, mother Guinea Pig Penny, twins Patty and Paden, double stroller with rotating wheels and adjustable canopy cover, baby ring toy and bunny toy.
feature_bullets: Includes mother Penny Guinea Pig, twins Patty and Paden, double stroller with rotating wheels and adjustable canopy cover, baby ring toy and bunny toy
All Critters come with removable detailed clothing
Mother Penny Guinea Pig measures approximately 2.5” tall. Twin babies Patty and Paden measure approximately 1.25” tall
Can be used independently or with all Calico Critters figures, houses, shops and vehicles
Mix and match with other Calico Critters play sets to create a whole Calico Critters village!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars823 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
